 Basic guidelines (6/7)                 
                                        
                                        
 * Don't be a minimod. This includes    
   threatening users with               
   reports/timeouts, calling people alts
   because they're new, and sending     
   excessive and frivolous reports to   
   moderators. Please tell us in Twitch 
   whispers or Discord DMs about people 
   breaking the rules. If possible,     
   avoid sending reports via public     
   channels. There's no need to incite  
   public drama by doing so.
